name: 1 If By Land, 2 If By Sea
name_original: 1 If By Land, 2 If By Sea
description:
Team up with your best bud for a unique co-op experience featuring a completely original soundtrack! 

As bird, player 1 must maneuver and shoot to take down the ravens in their wake.  

As fish, player 2 must collect ammo and items from the murky deep to help their teammate. 

Work together and show those pesky ravens whose boss!

(Game was made for Global Game Jam 2022)

Controls

Player 1 - W Key, S Key, Space Bar

Player 2 - Up Arrow Key, Down Arrow Key

Credits:

Randomocity Gaming (aka me) - Design, Programming, Additional Spritework

Randomocity Remixes (also me, lol) - Music

Gerald Burke - Keyboard Key Sprites

Admurin - Fish Sprite

magici4n - Bird Sprite

ansimuz - Sky and Sea background spritework
